DOC.detailed_description: This study construct assess patient carious vital posterior teeth whether use Vita Suprinity® ( VITA Zahnfabrik H. Rauter GmbH & Co.KG- Germany ) Zirconia reinforce lithium silicate partial coverage restoration result high survival rate well patient related outcome score compare IPS-e.max® CAD ( Ivoclar Vivadent AG , Schaan - Liechtenstein ) lithium disilicate partial coverage restoration .
DOC.criteria: Participants : Good oral hygiene , papillary bleeding index ( PBI ) < 35 % . Positive patient acceptance participate trial . Teeth : Carious class II MOD lesion Vital upper low posterior teeth sign irreversible pulpitis . Normal occlusion Single tooth restoration ( edentulous space require fix prosthesis ) Participants Pregnancy . Disabilities . Systemic disease severe medical complication . Bad oral hygiene Heavy smoking . Xerostomia . Lack compliance . Evidence severe bruxism , clench , temporomandibular disorder . Teeth : Deep carious defect ( close pulp , less 1 mm distance ) . Periapical pathology sign pulpal pathology . Tooth hypersensitivity . Rampant caries . Nonvital endodontically treat teeth . Sever periodontal affection . Tooth mobility
